altername_name: Daikaijyuu Monogatari: The Miracle of the Zone II
name: Daikaijuu Monogatari: The Miracle of the Zone II
overview: The second GB version of the card game "MOZ", which is gaining popularity mainly among elementary school students. Appeared with a significant power-up. 119 types of cards including the blue chapter card have been added, the number of in-game tournaments has quadrupled, the in-game ranking setting system has been newly increased, and the purpose of aiming for the highest rank "Miracle Master" has been achieved. The characters have been renewed to 59 people, the map has increased by 4 places, the BGM has also been renewed, and the number of songs has increased significantly. Rare cards can be obtained by communicating data, which is a cable, with the "Poyon's Dungeon Room" that will be released in advance.
